price: 211. Demande aux Enfants d’Israël combien de preuves évidentes Nous leur avons apportées. Celui qui déforme la faveur (la religion) d’Allah quand elle lui est déjà parvenue, (qu’il sache qu’) Allah a le châtiment terrible.
arabic: سَلۡ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ كَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ ءَايَةِۭ بَيِّنَةٖۗ وَمَن يُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: sal banī is'rāīla kam ātaynāhum min āyatin bayyinatin waman yubaddil niʿ'mata al-lahi min baʿdi mā jāathu fa-inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
